description:
SimpleX - the first messaging network operating without user identifiers of any kind - 100% private by design! iOS,
Android and desktop apps ðŸ“±!

Unlike any other existing messaging platform, SimpleX has no identifiers assigned to the users - it does not use phone
numbers (like Signal or WhatsApp), domain-based addresses (like email, XMPP or Matrix), usernames (like Telegram),
public keys or even random numbers (like all other messengers) to identify its users - we do not even know how many
people use SimpleX.
New in v6.3.1:
- improved scrolling and navigation in chats.
- faster onboarding for the new users.
- fixes.
Commits:
- docs: add reproducibility section (#5732)
- blog: update v6.3 release post (#5733)
- ios: fix random crashes in chat on iOS 18 (#5734)
- ios: v6.3, build 269
- blog: update v6.3 blog post (#5735)
- desktop: fix postgres migration (#5739)
- flatpak: update metainfo (#5740)
- directory: more permissive captcha rules (#5741)
- directory: use lowercase letters in captcha, accept any case for same-looking letters (#5744)
- ios: scrolling improvements (#5746)
- android, desktop: fix crash on very long quoted message (#5751)
- core: exclude CLI modules from client library (#5758)
- android, desktop: fix negative content offset on some Android devices (#5752)
- android, desktop: open links from notes (#5761)
- core: update simplexmq to support PostgreSQL servers (#5760)
- android, desktop: menu near top floating button (#5764)
- android, desktop: scrolling improvements (#5753)
- android, desktop: enhancements to floating buttons (#5763)
- ios: moving content up when setting emoji on the first message (#5766)
- ios: XCode 16 workaround to prevent stack overflow (#5771)
- core: 6.3.1.0 (simplexmq 6.3.1.0)
- readme: update SimpleX users group link (#5772)
- docs: update server doc about reproducing builds (#5779)
- ui: move operators selection to sheet on onboarding (#5783)
- directory: joining groups with enabled captcha screening and observer role (#5784)
- core: 6.3.1.1
- ios: update core library
- ui: translations (#5791)
- website: translations (#5792)
- 6.3.1: ios 270, android 281, desktop 97
